description: Fibroma Molle, also known as skin tags, are small, benign growths that typically appear on the skin. They are usually harmless and painless, but can sometimes be bothersome or cosmetically undesirable.
possible causes: Friction or rubbing against the skin
symptoms: Small, soft, flesh-colored growths on the skin
May be attached to the skin by a thin stalk
Usually painless, but can become irritated or inflamed
treatments: No treatment necessary if not bothersome
